Trade/Device Name(s): ZEUS ELISA Treponema pallidum IgG Test System
Treponema pallidum IgG ELISA Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ZEUS ELISA Treponema pallidum IgG Test System for qualitative detection of T. pallidum IgG antibodies in human serum via ELISA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of specific IgG antibodies to Treponema pallidum in human serum, providing serological evidence of infection in conjunction with non-treponemal assays and clinical findings; not intended for blood or plasma donor screening
